OVERALL COORDINATOR.task: Master of the Day’s Program; this involves having a schedule of the wedding day at hand, from when the couple wake up to when they depart for their honeymoon, and ensuring it is followed to the letter
Primary Timekeeper; ensure the program is followed and the event runs on time start to end. Liaise with Officiating Pastor at the Service and Emcee at the Reception to carry out task

SECRETARY & TREASURER.task: Have the Wedding Records and Database at hand on the day of the wedding day
Pay suppliers before and on the wedding (in liaison with the Overall Coordinator)
Liaise with Overall Coordinator and Best Man on all financial matters after the wedding

FOOD AND BEVERAGE COORDINATOR.task: Ensure the food and the drinks are ready and delivered and in the agreed times
Ensure serving points are set up at the designated positions
Ensure food provided is as agreed in quality and quantity
Liaise with Ushering Coordinator to ensure parents, close family and bridal party are served

Ensure the following teams are served at the best times possible to ensure their functions or roles are uninterrupted: Ushers, before start of reception, Security: before start of reception Transport: together with the bridal party Photographers: together with the bridal party, Videographers: together with the bridal party, Entertainment: before start of reception
Ensure the cake is ready and delivered and in the agreed times
Ensure cake gazebo is set up at the designated positions
Ensure cake provided is as agreed in quality and quantity
Ensure cake and the components around the cake (cutlery, dressing, champagne/chamdor) are set up

AESTHETICS COORDINATOR.task: Ensure washrooms are clean at all times. Liaise with Venue service provider to accomplish this task
Ensure all cars are decorated at the agreed place and time. Liaise with Transport Coordinator to carry out task
Ensure tables/chairs and tents are set up and dressed as agreed and two hours before the start of the wedding service
Ensure service and reception areas (entrance, walkway, gazebo, high table, parent’s tables) are decorated as agreed and two hours before the start of the wedding service
Organize markings in wedding venue to direct guests

EXPERIENCE COORDINATOR.task: Ensure the media team are at the agreed venues above and at the agreed time
Hand over relevant badges to the media team

Ensure the M.C. and the entertainer (Deejay/Live Band) are at the venue two hours before the start of the wedding service/reception, or at the agreed time and that all the equipment is delivered and has been set up as agreed and two hours before the start of the wedding service/reception or at the agreed time)
Ensure music flows as agreed, e.g. music playing as guests stream into the service
Ensure M.C. announces monetary tokens are brought to gift table by the giver of the token (and any other gift)

TRANSPORT COORDINATOR.task: Ensure necessary cars are at a designated place and time for cleaning and decoration. Liaise with Aesthetics Coordinator to carry out task
Ensure the Wedding Couple's luggage is in the bride's vehicle during the Morning Family Ceremony and is moved to the vehicle transferring them to their first honeymoon destination

Organize safe travel of the following people on the day from the home to the wedding venue and on the agreed time and using the designated route: Bride, Best Couple, Bride’s Parents and Groom’s Parents

Ensure safe custody, handling and transportation of gifts to agreed storage after function, including having the registration of the vehicle taking the gifts to storage. Liaise with Security and Gift Movers Coordinator and Ushers & Gifts Personnel Coordinator to carry out task
Ensure security and ushering team able to travel from ceremony to reception

USHERS & GIFTS PERSONNEL COORDINATOR.task: Ensure ushers are at the wedding venue well before start of the wedding
Hand over relevant badges to the ushers
Direct guests to their sitting positions at service and reception
Direct guests to designated food serving points
Ensure parents, close family and bridal party are served
Direct guests to exits and amenities when needed
Hand over relevant badges to the ushering team, security team, media team, paparazzi and overall coordinator
Receive gifts from guests, marking them appropriately
Ensure monetary token box is safely with Best Man after wedding
Liaise with Security & Gift Movers Coordinator to ensure security of gifts and Transport Coordinator to ensure transport of gifts to storage after wedding

SECURITY & GIFT MOVERS COORDINATOR.task: Ensure security team are at the wedding venue well before start of the wedding
Hand over relevant badges to the security team
Assist the security team of the venue with parking (where necessary)
Ensure gifts are well secured, including organizing two men at the gift table. Liaise with the Ushers & Gifts Personnel Coordinator to carry out task
Ensure the cake and components around the cake are well secured
Liaise with Transport Coordinator to ensure secure transportation of gifts to storage
Control paparazzi at the venue as agreed by committee

Control photographers / videographers among the guests from inconveniencing: The official photographers, The official videographers, The other guests from witnessing proceedings (exchange of vows, the kiss, cake cutting etc.)

GROOMSMEN'S COORDINATOR.task: Ensure the team strictly observes these specific time slots: Wake up and preparation time, Departure time to church
Ensure the team are cooperative and coordinated when: leaving the ceremony for the photo shoot, during the photo shoot, leaving the photo shoot for the wedding reception

BRIDESMAIDS' COORDINATOR.task: Ensure the team strictly observes these specigic time slots: Wake up and preparation time (especially hair styling sessions and makeup sessions), Departure time to church
Ensure the hair stylist and makeup artiste have arrived on yime morning of the wedding
Ensure the team are cooperative and coordinated when: leaving the ceremony for the photo shoot, during the photo shoot, leaving the photo shoot for the wedding reception
